ygData.subject: Re: Dragon Drop: Tooth that summons 49th lvl Necro pet.
ygData.msgSnippet: The tooth just says Dragon Tooth .  It is the dragon scale that is colored...White Dragon Scale for Vox, and Red Dragon Scale for Nag. Mik ... From: Mystik
ygData.messageBody:
The tooth just says "Dragon Tooth". It is the dragon scale that is
colored...White Dragon Scale for Vox, and Red Dragon Scale for Nag.

Mik
----- Original Message -----
From: "Mystik" <mystik@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 10:27 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Dragon Drop: Tooth that summons 49th lvl Necro
pet.


> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> it's off of vox....i believe it's called a white dragon's tooth...there's
also
> one off nag that does the same thing...i think red dragon's tooth maybe?
>
> (\/)ystix
>

repost
